posts.post_content: Amazing card, as noted above, but when it was first printed, Fast Bond could not be abused the way it is now with [Zuran Orb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zuran Orb) and [Crucible of Worlds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crucible of Worlds). Fast Bond acted as a mini-mana ramp back then, and rarely was a player able to play more than three or so lands (taking 3 damage in the process) using this enchantment. On the other hand, having four lands out on the first turn can be a huge advantage - Heck, players could play Fast Bond, lay down the rest of their land and then drop a first turn [Gray Ogre](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gray Ogre)! Or something good.
posts.html:
Amazing card, as noted above, but when it was first printed, Fast Bond could not be abused the way it is now with Zuran Orb and Crucible of Worlds. Fast Bond acted as a mini-mana ramp back then, and rarely was a player able to play more than three or so lands (taking 3 damage in the process) using this enchantment. On the other hand, having four lands out on the first turn can be a huge advantage - Heck, players could play Fast Bond, lay down the rest of their land and then drop a first turn Gray Ogre! Or something good.

posts.post_content: SirDoom, opening hand of 1 Forest, 3 Land, Fastbond, Zuran Orb, Crucible of Worlds. Play Forest, cast Fastbond, play other 3 land taking 3 damage, play Crucible and Zuran Orb. From there you can sac the lands to the orb and replay them thanks to Crucible and Fastbond.
posts.html:
SirDoom, opening hand of 1 Forest, 3 Land, Fastbond, Zuran Orb, Crucible of Worlds. Play Forest, cast Fastbond, play other 3 land taking 3 damage, play Crucible and Zuran Orb. From there you can sac the lands to the orb and replay them thanks to Crucible and Fastbond.

Posted By: Zher0 (6/11/2009 7:29:39 PM)

posts.post_content:
Fastbond is one of the best cards ever printed. Add Zuran Orb and Crucible of Worlds and you have infinite life and Mana, and add Braingeyser for a first turn win without using any Power9. amazing.  
  
EDIT:  
  
The other guy already mentioned how to do it, but I did have a Sol Ring for this, which speeded up a little bit, but since Sol Ring is restricted in everything it's allowed in, it's hard to get that AND Fastbond in your opening hand, so the Lands work more often, and Sol Ring of course is great.  
  
But anyway, as I said, the other poster already showed how to do this and win a game on turn 0 or 1 without any Power 9 cards.  
  
I built a deck specifically to do this, and it's a type of Vercursion deck that can win on turn 1 without any cards over a certain price. You can of course add the Power 9 to it, which makes it even faster, but not everyone can afford that so I wanted to find a way to win on the first turn without expensive stuff. I did it so I'm proud of that anyway.
posts.html:
Fastbond is one of the best cards ever printed. Add Zuran Orb and Crucible of Worlds and you have infinite life and Mana, and add Braingeyser for a first turn win without using any Power9. amazing.

EDIT:

The other guy already mentioned how to do it, but I did have a Sol Ring for this, which speeded up a little bit, but since Sol Ring is restricted in everything it's allowed in, it's hard to get that AND Fastbond in your opening hand, so the Lands work more often, and Sol Ring of course is great.

But anyway, as I said, the other poster already showed how to do this and win a game on turn 0 or 1 without any Power 9 cards.

I built a deck specifically to do this, and it's a type of Vercursion deck that can win on turn 1 without any cards over a certain price. You can of course add the Power 9 to it, which makes it even faster, but not everyone can afford that so I wanted to find a way to win on the first turn without expensive stuff. I did it so I'm proud of that anyway.

posts.post_content:
When Amulet of Vigor comes out this will enable turn 2 Kills,
  
   
Turn 1 Forest: Amulet of Vigor
  
Turn 2, Tap Forest- Play [Fastbond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fastbond), then play an untapped [Simic Growth Chamber](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Simic Growth Chamber) returning the forest, then tap the [Simic Growth Chamber](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Simic Growth Chamber) for 2 mana and then play a Boros Garrison, returning the Growth Chamber, you keep returning in a loop for a cost of 1 life for 2 mana, until you have done it 11times and you have lost 11 life for 22mana at which point you fireball/banefire/disintegrate them to death.
  
   
In multiplayer you can do it further with a [Dawnglow infusion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dawnglow infusion) for more more life to get even more mana, of course you would need different bounce lands but the two above are just examples.
  
   
Yay for silly Wizards printing ridiculous cards.
posts.html:
When Amulet of Vigor comes out this will enable turn 2 Kills,

Turn 1 Forest: Amulet of Vigor
Turn 2, Tap Forest- Play Fastbond, then play an untapped Simic Growth Chamber returning the forest, then tap the Simic Growth Chamber for 2 mana and then play a Boros Garrison, returning the Growth Chamber, you keep returning in a loop for a cost of 1 life for 2 mana, until you have done it 11times and you have lost 11 life for 22mana at which point you fireball/banefire/disintegrate them to death.

In multiplayer you can do it further with a Dawnglow infusion for more more life to get even more mana, of course you would need different bounce lands but the two above are just examples.

Yay for silly Wizards printing ridiculous cards.

posts.post_content:
@cute-hydra  
  
1. I like the name  
2. Why wait for turn 2?  
Do exactly like you said, but play fastbond first and use it to play an additional basic land to get the amulet and continue the loop as you stated. It takes up 1 more slot in your hand, so you won't be able to dawnglow infusion + something else, but you will be a turn ahead, and in some cases kill people before they get a turn.

elvish spirit guide to play this  
fastbond the bouncing legendary land from kamigawa, 19 life  
play hedron crab  
bounce the land to your hand, mill them 3  
fastbond the bouncing legendary land from kamigawa, 18 life  
repeat

Posted By: markarmor (7/23/2010 6:54:10 PM)

posts.post_content:
So all your lands become moxes? That's pretty reatarded power right there, get out the power of your hand in the first turn, in casual games, this could mean a harmonize and a couple of [Birds of Paradise](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Birds of Paradise) (its restricted in vintage but not really playable becasue it's not Blue or Black) With other colors it would be much more effective, imagine [Browbeat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Browbeat) turn 1, then if you get to draw then you can wreck even more havoc (not to mention your mana base is stable, so you get to keep the lands next turn, as opposed to something like [Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual))  
  
Basically anyone who knows about how good moxes are will know what I'm talking about.
